title: Dancing with Your Heart - Novel Updates
genre: Josei   Mature   Romance   School Life   Smut
tags: C*nnilingus   Female Protagonist   First Love   First-time Interc**rse   Handsome Male Lead   H*ndjob   Jealousy   M*sturbation   Modern Day   Obsessive Love   Older Love Interests   Popular Love Interests   Possessive Characters   Secret Crush   Student-Teacher Relationship   Toys   Wealthy Characters
author: Song Qiu Qiu   宋秋秋
description:
There was an unwritten rule in the ballet world: If the male or female dancer is too nervous before getting on stage, they’ll need their partner’s help to reach their org*sm once to make the body soft. Only then will they have an amazing performance.

Every time before Bai Zhi’s performance or competition starts, the one who responsible for ‘making her tight body soft’, was her mentor, Chen Liu.

As he did it, she not even lost her body, but also her heart. Dancing academy’s sweet and tender new student X ballet department’s choreography mentor.

Note: The rule of making their partner's body 'soft' is entirely fictional and has nothing to do with how things are done in real life. I've added this rule into the story based on a random post I'd read online.>
